summary: AN ORDINANCE granting a franchise to Northwest Cablevision, Inc., dba Teleprompter of Seattle, for the operation of a cable communications system (CATV) in the Northwest Cable Television Franchise District bounded on the North by North and Northwest 145th Street, on the East by Interstate Five, on the South by North and Northwest 85th Street, and on the West from Northwest 132nd Street by 3rd Avenue Northwest, and from Northwest 132nd Street to the Northern Seattle City Limits by Puget Sound.
